勶字的基本解释

勶
chè
发射。
古同“撤”。
古同“徹”。
古通“辙（zh?）”。

勶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chè］
［《集韻》敕列切，入薛，徹。］
(1)“撤”的古字。
(2)通“轍”。

勶字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　勶； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页150第03
【集韻】直列切，音轍。本作撤，去也。通作徹。【說文】發也。【正譌】徹通也。古文作勶。又【集韻】敕列切，音徹。義同。

勶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
勶字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
勶
chè
emission.
Gu Tong "withdraws".
Gu Tong "torue".
Gu Tong "zhe (zh?)".
勶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chè］
["Ji Yun" cut through the imperial column, into Xue, tore. ]
(1) The ancient word "withdraw".
(2) Through "zhe".
勶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　勶; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 150 03
【Ji Yun】cut in line, sound track. This is withdrawn, go also. Thoroughly. [Said the text] also made. [Zhengzheng] Thoroughly. Ancient writings. Also 【Jiyun】The Evil Lie is cut, and the sound is thorough. The same meaning.
